sql.item: select to_char(t.start_time, 'dd"日"hh24"时"') start_time, t.res_type, t.res_inuse, t.res_free, t.res_total from EMG_EMERGENCY_RES t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_EMERGENCY_RES a where a.region_id = ${region_id})

select to_char(t.start_time, 'dd"日"hh24"时"') start_time, t.ne_type, t.complain_num from EMG_NETWORK_COMPLAIN t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_NETWORK_COMPLAIN a where a.region_id = ${region_id})

with t as (select a.*, rownum row_num from (select t.start_time, to_char(t.start_time, 'hh24') sort_time, t.complain_num from EMG_NETWORK_COMPLAIN t where t.region_id = 100 and t.ne_type = '${ne_type}' and t.start_time > (select max(start_time) - 25 / 24 from EMG_NETWORK_COMPLAIN a where a.region_id = ${region_id}) order by start_time) a) select t1.start_time, t2.sort_time, t1.complain_num openValue, t2.complain_num closeValue, abs(t2.complain_num - t1.complain_num) changeValue, case when (t2.complain_num - t1.complain_num > 0) then '#EE6CA6' else '#6CF8FC' end color from t t1, t t2 where (t1.row_num = t2.row_num - 1) order by t1.row_num
